alert.note: Alert for City of Hyder (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 25 at 8:50AM AKST until February 25 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: The surface low is tracking SE and inland over the southern panhandle Saturday morning. Periods of moderate snow continues on the N and SE quadrants of the low, but has largely cleared on the west side from Kake west and northward. Scattered snow showers expected in the wake of the low through the rest of the afternoon. Snow continues to be dry and powdery. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...City of Hyder. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to be dry with rates diminishing through the day. Report of over 11 inches was received as of 330am Saturday at Hyder.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
